Name: Pumpkin Death Garden
About the game: WARNING: this game has thousands of bugs (but they're features). Shoot them , or they'll eat your pumpkins! No micro-transactions, DLC, or in-game purchases. You get the full game for free! You're free to listen to your favorite music while playing, as this game has no music of its own. Get competitive on the leaderboards ! Your score is the amount of bugs you killed. Are you a shotgun person, a sniper rifle person, or an assault rifle person? Try them out to find your favourite. Each has a unique play style with strengths and drawbacks! When you level up, you are given a choice of three random gun mods. Earn coins when you play, and spend them on upgrades! The Time Clock Want to sit back, relax, and shoot some bugs? Play the game on normal speed . Looking for an intense challenge? Try the game on 2x speed , or even unlock 4x speed! Controls W, A, S and D to move. Use the mouse to aim, and left click to shoot. Feel free to leave a review. Enjoy! Harvest 10 pumpkins to earn this trophy: What is the highest rank you can achieve? Harvest more pumpkins to improve your rank! Grow a huuuuuge pumpkin patch!
